description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of 0.
Choosing option 1 risks a zero payoff if the other player defects
Mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) maximizes individual payoffs
Defecting (choosing option 2) when the other cooperates results in a lower payoff for the defector compared to mutual cooperation
The game has multiple equilibria, with mutual cooperation being Pareto optimal
